GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array one article, specified by article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments specific to the article_id

article.author: fred
article.body: all other comments will look like these two objects

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: amends to the vote count by a specified number (positive or negative integer) for a specific article_id
PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.response: will return the updated article object

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: allows author to post a new comment under a specific article_id
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.response: will return the newly created comment in an array

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from the comments database, specified by comment_id
